## Description {#details}

This class implements -time-passes functionality for new pass manager.

It provides the pass-instrumentation callbacks that measure the pass execution time. They collect timing info into individual timers as passes are being run. At the end of its life-time it prints the resulting timing report.

Definition at line 44 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/passtiminginfo-h">PassTimingInfo.h</a>.

## Private Member Typedefs

### PassInvocationID {#af45b90509dd81917b8af65699f5be32b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>using llvm::TimePassesHandler::PassInvocationID =  std::pair&lt;StringRef, unsigned&gt;</>}>
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> of this type is capable of uniquely identifying pass invocations.

It is a pair of string Pass-Identifier (which for now is common to all the instance of a given pass) + sequential invocation counter.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/passtiminginfo-h/#l00048">48</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/passtiminginfo-h">PassTimingInfo.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

Returns the new timer for each new run of the pass.

Returns the timer for the specified pass invocation of <code>PassID</code>.

Each time it creates a new timer.
